altTitles.ja: 魔女は満月に咲く

altTitles.en: Witches Bloom Under the Full Moon

description.en: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
description.ja: 帆高航一（ほたか　こういち）はちょっとコジラセ気味な中学2年生。そんな彼はある日、「アルストロメリアの魔女」を名乗る謎の少女・紫麻（しま）と出会い、彼女の“契約者”に選ばれる。満月の夜を舞台に繰り広げられる、恋と魔法のファンタジー！
description.zh: 帆高航一是个有点内向的初二学生。某一天，他遇到了一个神秘的女孩紫麻，她自称“阿尔斯特罗梅里亚的女巫”，并被选为她的“契约者”。 在满月之夜缔结的爱情和魔法的幻想故事！

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

altTitles.en: Tales Of Akane
Akane Story

description.en:
Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. 
Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. 
Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br:
Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. 
Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. 
Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

altTitles.ja: 《魔力無限》のマナポーター ～パーティの魔力を全て供給していたのに、勇者に追放されました。魔力不足で聖剣が使えないと焦っても、メンバー全員が勇者を見限ったのでもう遅い～

altTitles.en: Manaporter of 《InfiniteMagic》

description.en:
Thanks to his infinite mana, Ishua has been working as a mana porter to the hero party, doing a perfect task of supplying mana to the party members who consumed a lof of MP and earning the trust of his companions. However, Alan, the hero decides to banish him from the party in a fit of jealousy. 

"We don't need a mana porter!"

And chasing after Ishua through the forest Aria, the saint, appears wishing to continue adventuring with Ishua. The story of the banished strongest mana porter begins here!
description.ja: 生まれ持った無限の魔力で、マナポーターとして勇者パーティ全員の魔力供給を担ってきたイシュア。だが彼は、ある日突然、理不尽な理由でパーティを追放されてしまう。落胆するイシュアのもとに、彼を追ってきたパーティ仲間の聖女アリアの姿が。実は追放は勇者の独断で、彼女はイシュアが自分たちを見捨てたと思い、連れ戻しに来たのだった。真実を知ったアリアはパーティ脱退を決意し、イシュアは彼女と二人で旅を始めることになる。追放された最強マナポーターと、彼を追放した勇者。二人の対照的な冒険が今始まる!!

altTitles.en: I Thought It's a Common Isekai Story
I Thought It Was a Common Possession

altTitles.fr: Not So Bad to Be Bad!

description.en: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
description.ko:
그럼 그렇지, 내 팔자에 무슨 주인공이야.

남편 손에 죽을 팔자의 악녀였지만, 난 이 클리셰를 안다!​
억울하게 죽은 대가로는 꽤 괜찮다고 생각했다.
원작의 흐름에서 벗어나지 못한다는 걸 깨닫기 전까지는.
결국 원작대로 죽을 거라면, 초미남 남편에게 뽀뽀라도 해보자!

altTitles.ja: 瀬戸さんを笑わせたい紬ちゃん

altTitles.en: Tsumugi-chan Wants to Make Seto-san Laugh

description.en:
Seto-san is a beautiful and cool class president. Her smiling face must be absolutely wonderful. I want to see it! 

This is a short comic in which Tsumugi-chan, a ditzy girl with whom Seto-san has had a little bit of contact with since the entrance ceremony, boldly tries various strategies to make Seto-san laugh — but usually fails. However, there seems to be something quite interesting about Seto-san...
description.ja: キレイでかっこいい学級委員長の瀬戸さん。笑った顔はきっと素敵なはず。……見たい！ 入学式のときからちょっと接点があったドジっ子の紬ちゃんが、果敢に瀬戸さんを笑わそうと多彩な作戦を繰り出して失敗するショートコミック。……なのだけど、瀬戸さんの様子がどうもおかしい！！！！

title.en: The Devil Who Kisses My Feet

altTitles.en: The Demon Who Kisses My Foot

description.en:
Maria, who is in an unhappy marriage with her sadistic husband, unexpectedly receives news. Lowell, her husband's half-brother, had returned from the battlefield.

 Maria, who had personally educated and raised him, learned that he  was no longer the small child or immature boy Maria remembered. He had the appearance of a grown man. 

With his appearance, a rift slowly began to appear in the seemingly peaceful Marquis Redford.

Where would this relationship, which should never have begun, end?
description.pl: Kiedy młoda Maria zostaje wydana za mąż za Jacquesa Redforda, bogatego szlachcica, jest wdzięczna, że wydaje się on być łagodny i wyrozumiały. Jednak posiadłość Redfordów skrywa mroczne sekrety, a życie Marii zmienia się na gorsze, gdy na jaw wychodzą sadystyczne upodobania jej męża. Nie mając nikogo, na kim mogłaby się oprzeć, Maria znajduje pocieszenie w towarzystwie nieślubnego przyrodniego brata Jacquesa, Lowella. Teraz, gdy Lowell wrócił do domu jako bohater wojenny, czy może uratować Marię przed jej okrutnym losem?

title.en: Demon Slayer - Kono Futari Fukakouryoku ni Tsuki (Doujinshi)

description.en: Pairing: Tomioka Giyuu x Shinazugawa Sanemi

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

altTitles.ja: よぅ、アクアリスト

altTitles.en: Hey, Aquarist

description.en: A delinquent boy was out at a festival when he finds a discarded goldfish. Recalling his childhood experience of buying a goldfish from a festival stall and bringing it home only to have it die, he tries to make up for it by releasing the goldfish into the river. However, a mysterious girl stops him and tells him that it is not allowed to let out goldfish into the wild, and he learns how to keep goldfish at home and becomes a proper "aquarist."
description.ja: 見た目は派手だが根は優しいテツオは祭の最中、ゴミ箱に無造作に捨てられている金魚を拾う。川に逃がそうとしたその時、謎の和服美少女・カナデがその行為にまったをかける――！アクアリストのカナデと出会い、テツオは金魚を飼うことを決意する。だが、思っていたよりも金魚を飼うことは大変で――!?
description.ru: Тэцуо — парень с вызывающей внешностью, но очень добрым сердцем. Однажды он попал на фестиваль, где находит выброшенных золотых рыбок. Когда же Тэцуо собрался выпустить их в реку, он замечает девушку...
description.es-la: Tetsuo un chico bastante llamativo, pero que en el fondo es alguien amable, recoge unos peces dorados que fueron tirados a la basura durante un festival; mientras intentaba liberarlos en el rio... ¿¡Se encontró con una solitaria y hermosa chica!?

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Kishi wa, Kanarazu Shinu Heroine wo Sukuu Tame Isekai Demo Saikyou no Kishi to Naru ~Ryoutei ni Hana wo, Ryoute ni Ken wo~

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の騎士は、必ず死ぬヒロインを救うため異世界でも最強の騎士となる ～両手に花を、両手に剣を～

altTitles.en: The Strongest Knight in the World, in an Attempt to Save the Heroines Who Were Destined to Die, Decided to Become the Strongest in Another World as Well ~ Flowers in Both Hands, Swords in Both Hands ~

description.en:
He who fell in love with the heroine overturned her destiny to save her from her timely demise.

Abandoned by his parents, bullied in high school, and left in solitude—a young boy named Mikazuki Kenya.

At the brink of despair, he encounters a fateful meeting in his only hobby, VR gaming.

A meeting with “Kaguya” and “Reina,” the heroines from the immensely popular game “Knight of Giant.”

The time spent with the two heroines saved him, and he was head over heels for both of them.

However, in the story, one of them is destined to die…

To change that fate, he dedicated his life to mastering the game and becoming the strongest in the world.

Suddenly, Kenya finds himself entering the world of “Knight of Giant”?!

The strongest gamer embarks on a heroic tale of becoming the strongest in another world, in order to save the heroines he fell deeply in love with. The story begins.
description.ja:
ガチ恋したヒロインを救うため運命を覆せ！

両親に捨てられ、高校では虐められ、孤独となった少年・御剣剣也。絶望の淵に居た時、唯一の趣味であるVRゲームで運命の出会いを果たす。それは、大人気ゲーム『Knight of Giant』のヒロイン「かぐや」と「レイナ」。二人のヒロインと過ごす時間が彼を救い、二人ともにガチ恋した。しかし、彼女たちはストーリーの中でどちらかが必ず死ぬ運命・・・そんな運命を変えるため、世界最強となるまで人生を捧げてゲームを極めた末に、突如、剣也は『Knight of Giant』の世界に入り込んでしまう――!?

altTitles.ja: アリスさんちの囲炉裏端

altTitles.th: มื้ออุ่นหน้าเตาแห่งบ้านคุณอลิซ

altTitles.en: By The Hearth At Alice-san's Home
By the Furnace of Miss Alice’s House

description.en:
After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past...

Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.
description.pt-br: Depois de 10 anos, Alice volta de Tóquio para a sua cidade natal e mora sozinha em uma antiga casa tradicional Japonesa com lareira. Harumi, um amigo de infância, estava animado para se encontrar novamente depois de muito tempo, mas o calor da lareira com Alice continua tão quente quanto no passado...

altTitles.ja: 三咲くんは攻略キャラじゃない

altTitles.en: Misaki-kun is Unobtainable

altTitles.ja-ro: Misaki-kun wa Kouryaku Chara ja Nai

description.en: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!
description.ja: ここはギャルゲーの世界。 親友キャラ・三咲泉の使命は、主人公・季原晴太のヒロイン攻略のサポート…のはずが、 肝心の季原は何故か三咲を攻略するつもりで――!? 「男の子のままヒロインになってくれ！」 友情？愛情？男の娘ハッピー胸キュンコメディ!!

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士

altTitles.en: Fate Rewinder
All Great Achievements Require Time

description.en: An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case!
description.ja: 悲運の死を遂げた人々を救う組織、時空警察特殊機動隊、通称「巻戻士」！彼らの武器は右眼に埋め込まれたタイムマシン「リトライアイ」！事件を解決するまで何十回、何百回、何千回と時を巻き戻す！
description.vi: Biệt đội cơ động cảnh sát thời không, hay còn gọi tắt là "Cảnh sát thời gian" (Người tua ngược/Rewinder) là một tổ chức giải cứu những người có cái chết bất đắc kì tử! Họ sử dụng một cỗ máy thời gian ở mắt phải "Retry Eye"! Những cảnh sát thời gian có thể quay ngược thời gian hàng chục, hàng trăm tới hàng nghìn lần cho đến khi phá được vụ án! Bộ truyện từng lập kỷ lục suốt 1 năm liền đứng đầu liên tục trong danh sát truyện yêu thích của tạp chí Corocoro Comic.

title.en: Do you like a baby-faced boss?

altTitles.ja: 童顔な上司は好きですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Dougan na Joushi wa suki desu ka?

altTitles.vi: Em có thích một cấp trên mặt búng ra sữa không?

description.en: A romantic comedy story between a baby-faced boss and a mature subordinate.
description.ja: 童顔上司と貫禄女子の凸凹ラブコメ

description.en:
Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

Molly, a cute 13-year-old girl, has been bullied by ruffians ever since she was little. Determined never to be harassed again, she gets herself into an elite school – a place free from hooligans and gangsters, or so she thinks! It isn't long before she finds herself the lackey of a mysterious boy in black – a gangster belonging to a pre-eminent gang in the underworld! An action-packed tale peppered with budding romance...

altTitles.ja: 僕のジェミニ

description.en:
Who died at that time... Which one?

John is red-haired and freckled. His only pride is that he is a close friend of the school's popular twins, Jekyll and Hyde. The twins always pretended to be each other, but suddenly one of the twins died. Who was left... Which one!?

altTitles.en: Mir's Cloister

altTitles.ja: 神の回廊

altTitles.en: Mire's Corridor

description.en:
One day, a girl woke up from a near car accident, and her name was Baek Nabi. After her chance encounter with a beautiful man, who saved her from the accident, Nabi starts to see things she has never seen before. Creatures who live off from human’s negative emotions are called ‘parasites’ . Nabi’s once normal life has overturned and becomes intertwined with several men all at the same time… “You’re a special existence. You just haven’t remembered yet.” A fantasy romance of Nabi and the mysterious beings around her.  


---

Official English translation by Comico's [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/208)

altTitles.en: A Poison Master in the Sichuan Tang Clan
The Poison Master of Sacheon Tang Clan

description.en:
Spicy Fabre, a million-streamer known for his expertise in poisons and venomous insects, was bitten by a black mamba during a local shoot in Africa and subsequently reincarnated in the world of Murim.

Now in a jungle raising poisonous insects, the streamer has caught the attention of the Sichuan Tang Clan, renowned for its mastery of poison arts, who wants him.

"Join us and become a member."

title.en: Ore no Haitoku Meshi o Onedari Sezu ni Irarenai, Otonari no Top Idol-sama

altTitles.ja: 俺の背徳メシをおねだりせずにいられない、お隣のトップアイドルさま

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Haitoku Meshi wo Onedari Sezu ni Irarenai, Otonari no Top Idol-sama

altTitles.en: Nextdoor Top Idol–sama Can't Help But Beg For My Sinful Meals

altTitles.es-la: La super idol de al lado no puede resistirse a mis comidas tentadoras y culpables

description.en:
A meddlesome high schooler, Mamori Suzufumi, helps her neighbor who had collapsed from hunger. The neighbor turns out to be none other than the extremely popular high school idol, Sasaki Yuzuki!

Yuzuki had been excessively restricting her diet in order to maintain her image as the perfect idol. But when the worried Suzufumi serves her a homemade meal...

"...Aahhhhhhhhhnn! I can't take it anymore!"

With a face full of bliss, Yuzuki devours the meal completely! Seeing her eat so happily, Suzufumi decides to tempt her with her favorite dishes and make her succumb to 'food bliss.'
___
**Character Designer:** [Hizuki Higure](https://mangadex.org/author/58898e8a-597d-48fd-8cf3-e489cb2e9f7d)
description.ja:
"おせっかい”な高校生・真守鈴文はお腹を空かせて倒れていたマンションの隣人を助ける。
その正体は人気絶頂の女子高生アイドル・有須優月だった!

理想のアイドルでいるため、過度な食事制限をしていた優月。
だが心配した鈴文が手料理をふるまうと、

「……はああああああああああああっっ!」
「もう、無理ぃっ……!」

と幸せいっぱいの顔で完食! その食べっぷりに鈴文は、優月の大好物で誘惑して《メシ堕ち》させることを決意する。
ちょっと特別なお隣さんのお腹とハートを掴む、メシ堕ちラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: 今日も来たんすか、依田先輩。

altTitles.en: Have You Come Again Today, Yoda-senpai?

altTitles.vi: Hôm nay chị lại tới nữa à, Yoda-senpai?

description.en: This woman makes herself at home in my parents' house. She is a senior in the same high school and a friend of my sister's. It seems to take her two hours to get to school each way, so she stays at my house almost every day. Yoda is defenseless and a bit out of the ordinary, and I'm always on the edge of my seat!
description.ja:
**ひとつ屋根の下で巻き起こる、天然小悪魔お姉さん×オタク男子の日常ショートラブコメデイ！**

俺の実家で、我が家のようにくつろぐこの女。 同じ高校の先輩で、姉の友達の依田燈。 学校まで片道2時間らしく、ほぼ毎日俺の家に居座っている。 無防備で少し抜けてる依田先輩に振り回されて、ドキドキしっぱなし!! ひとつ屋根の下で巻き起こる、天然小悪魔お姉さん×オタク男子の日常ショートラブコメデイ！

altTitles.en: Blue Exorcist

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิสต์พันธุ์ปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 青のエクソシスト
青の祓魔師

description.en:
Rin and his exorcist classmates are caught in a secret war against the forces of darkness.
Raised by Father Fujimoto, a famous exorcist, Rin Okumura never knew his real father. One day a fateful argument with Father Fujimoto forces Rin to face a terrible truth—the blood of the demon lord Satan runs in Rin’s veins! Rin swears to defeat Satan, but doing that means entering the mysterious True Cross Academy and becoming an exorcist himself.
description.fr: Ce monde se compose de deux dimensions jointes en une seule, comme un miroir. Le premier est le monde dans lequel vivent les humains, Assiah. L’autre est le monde des démons, la géhenne. Habituellement, voyager entre les deux, et même tout type de contact entre les deux, est impossible. Cependant, les démons peuvent passer dans ce monde en possédant tout ce qui existe en son sein. Satan est peut-être le roi des démons, mais il y a une chose qu’il n’a pas, et c’est une substance dans le monde humain qui est assez puissante pour le contenir ! Dans ce but, il a créé Rin, son fils avec une femme humaine, mais le fils acceptera-t-il ses plans? Ou va-t-il devenir autre chose...? Un exorciste ?
description.tr: Dünya, ayna gibi birbirine zıt iki farklı boyuttan oluşmaktaydı: İnsanların yaşadığı Assiah ve iblislerin hüküm sürdüğü Gehenna. Bu iki boyut arasında iletişim ve seyahat mümkün olmamasına rağmen iblisler, insanların ruhlarını ele geçirerek Assiah'a ulaşabiliyorlardı.İblislerin tanrısı Şeytan, kendisini barındırabilecek kadar güçlü bir insan bulamadığı için Gehenna'da sıkışıp kalmıştı. Bunu aşmak için, bir insan kadınından Okumura Rin adında bir çocuk sahibi oldu.Şeytan'ın oğlu, babasına yardım edecek mi, yoksa başka bir şeye mi dönüşecek? Bir ruh kovucuya mı?
description.uk: Дві сторони однієї монети, два виміри, які є віддзеркаленнями один одного - саме з них і складається всесвіт. Перший – це наш матеріальний світ, Ассія. Другий – це світ демонів, Геєна. За звичайних обставин ні подорож, ні який завгодно контакт між ними є неможливим. Проте демони можуть перетнути кордон, у що-небудь вселившись. Сатана - повелитель демонів і король Геєни, жодна жива душа в Ассії не здатна довго витримувати його присутність. І щоб створити сильне вмістилище, він зачав сина з людською жінкою, Ріна. Але чи погодиться Рін з його планами? Чи може все ж захоче стати кимось іншим?.. Екзорцистом?
description.pt-br: Este mundo consiste em duas dimensões unidas como uma só, como um espelho. O primeiro é o mundo em que vivem os humanos, Assiah. O outro é o mundo dos demônios, Gehenna. Normalmente, viajar entre os dois e, na verdade, qualquer tipo de contato entre os dois, é impossível. No entanto, os demônios podem passar para este mundo possuindo qualquer coisa que exista dentro dele. Satanás pode ser o rei dos demônios, mas há uma coisa que ele não possui: uma substância no mundo humano que seja poderosa o suficiente para contê-lo! Para isso ele criou Rin, seu filho com uma mulher humana, mas será que seu filho concordará com seus planos? Ou ele se tornará outra coisa...? Um exorcista?

title.en: If I Added the Receptionist to the Party...

altTitles.ja: 受付嬢をパーティに入れたら…

altTitles.ja-ro: Uketsuke Jou o Party ni Iretara...

altTitles.ja: ホワイトタイガーとブラックタイガー

description.en:
White Tiger went into the woods to find a strong tiger called "Black Tiger" and met Black Tiger, the shrimp.

It's a web manga on Twitter by NITORI Sasami, the author of "Wonder Cat Kyuu-chan" (Fushigi Neko no Kyuu-chan).

title.en: THE ISEKAI DOCTOR　Any sufficiently advanced medical science is indistinguishable from magic.

altTitles.ja: 高度に発達した医学は魔法と区別がつかない

altTitles.ja-ro: Koudo ni Hattatsu Shita Igaku wa Mahou to Kubetsu ga Tsukanai
Koudo ni Hattatsu Shita Igaku ha Mahou to Kubetsu ga Tsukanai

altTitles.en: Any Sufficiently Advanced Medical Science Is Indistinguishable From Magic
Highly Advanced Medicine Is Indistinguishable From Magic
I Used High-Level Medicine to Counter Magic

altTitles.ne: उच्च विकसित औषधी जादू भन्दा कम छैन

altTitles.es-la: La medicina altamente desarrollada no se puede diferenciar de la magia

description.en:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States/Canada/Australia/New Zealand/Singapore only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)
description.ja: 医療魔法が独占された異世界に転移した現役医師・天海唯人。スライム、キマイラ、獣人…はじめて出会う住人たちに驚きながらも、わずかな医療器具と自身の知識で、病魔や怪我に立ち向かう。果たして彼は異世界の住人たちを治療し、苦しむ人々を救うことができるのか。
description.es-la:
¿Funciona la medicina moderna en otro mundo? Sin trampas ni equipos modernos. Un médico se enfrenta a un mundo dominado por la magia. El doctor Amami Yuito es transferido a un mundo diferente donde la magia médica está monopolizada. Slimes, quimeras, hombres bestia... Le sorprenden los habitantes con los que se encuentra por primera vez, pero con el poco equipo médico que tiene y sus propios conocimientos, es capaz de combatir enfermedades y heridas.
¿Podrá curar a los habitantes del otro mundo y salvar a los que sufren? Una fantasía de "Mundo diferente" x "médico" sin trampas ni equipos modernos, escrita por Tsuda Houkou que además es un médico en funciones e ilustrada por el prometedor Takishita Nobuhide!

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレカフェへようこそ！
鬼畜島

altTitles.en: Evil Land

description.en: University students shipwrecked and forced to board a deserted island with a serial killer.

altTitles.ja: ガンダムエグザ　ブイエス
ガンダムEXAVS

description.en:
Gundam EXA VS (ガンダム EXA VS) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by Kōichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2014 to be tied in with the arcade Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Maxi Boost. It's the sequel to the previous manga series, Gundam EXA.

Some time after the events of Gundam EXA, Sthesia Awar informs Leos Alloy that she discovered a new GA data cluster from a computer outside of Jupiter X. The two dive into the new data and find themselves in the Universal Century, during the attack on Side 7. However, after entering the colony, they find that the inside was in ruins, and the RX-78-02 Gundam has been destroyed before it could be activated by Amuro Ray.

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん
Hiiragi-san is a little careless.

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.ja: ラブスクライブ！

description.en: "I like what I like!" An encounter between two trendy people and their friendship!

altTitles.ja: ダイヤモンドの功罪

description.en: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.

title.en: Fake Saint of the Year: You Wanted the Perfect Saint? Too Bad!

altTitles.ja-ro: Nise Seijo Kuso of the Year: Risou no Seijo? Zannen, Nise Seijo deshita!

altTitles.ru: Фальшивая святая, отброс года. ~Идеальная святая? Нет, всего лишь подделка!~

altTitles.ja: 偽聖女クソオブザイヤー～理想の聖女？　残念、偽聖女でした！～

description.en:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] is a game ill-suited of being known as a galge, as the main heroine would – regardless of the chosen route – meet her demise.

Fudou Niito, a resident of Japan, went to bed dissatisfied with the ending of the game. When he next awoke, he found himself in the body of the game’s hated fake saint, Elrise. Confused, but with an understanding that Elrise’s actions would spell disaster for many lives in the future, he took advantage of the situation and acted to change the course of history.

As a result, despite her rotten personality, Elrise was adored by those around her as a perfect saint. Furthermore, the game itself was intrinsically linked to his original world and changed accordingly to suit Elrise’s actions. Without any knowledge of what the hell was going on, the fake saint Elrise continued to alter her fate.

A saint on the outside, but a man on the inside.

The transmigrator was a piece of shit and the person he transmigrated into was also a piece of shit. A combination of shit and shit would cause an accident – to create the greatest fake saint shitshow of the year!
description.id:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] adalah sebuah permainan yang tidak cocok untuk di panggil sebagai galge, karena apapun rute yang di pilih heroine utama akan selalu menemui ajalnya.

Fudou Niito, seorang penduduk di jepang, pergi tidur dengan ketidakpuasan pada akhir dari gamenya. Selanjutnya ketika dia terbangun, ia menemukan dirinya berada dalam tubuh seorang saint yang di benci dalam game, Elrise.

Dia kebingungan, namun dengan pemahaman bahwa tindakan Elrise akan menyebabkan bencana untuk banyak kehidupan di masa depan, dia memanfaatkan situasi itu dan bertindak untuk mengubah jalannya sejarah.

Sebagai hasilnya, terlepas dari kepribadian busuknya, Elrise di cintai oleh orang-orang di sekitarnya sebagai seorang saint yang sempurna. Terlebih lagi, game itu sendiri pada intinya terhubung dengan dunia asli tempatnya berada dan berubah berdasarkan tindakan Elrise. Tanpa mengetahui apa yang sedang terjadi, seorang saint palsu Elrise terus-menerus mengubah takdirnya.

Seorang saint di luar, namun pria di dalamnya.

Orang yang merasuki adalah seorang bajingan dan orang yang di rasukinya juga merupakan seorang bajingan. Kombinasi dari para bajingan akan menyebabkan mala petaka yang akan menciptakan pertunjukan saint palsu bajingan terbesar tahun ini!
description.ja:
異世界で無双！　偽聖女で何が悪い…!?
ギャルゲー『永遠の散花』は、どのルートを選んでもメインヒロインが死ぬギャルゲーである。 ゲーム内に登場する悪役へ転生した俺は、ヒロインのエテルナを救うため、ゲーム知識をフル活用しようとするのだが…？
description.ru:
Визуальный роман «Куон но Санка ~Fiore caduto eterna~» — несправедливая игра, где в каждой из веток истории главная героиня умирает. Я, переродившийся в поддельную святую-злодейку игры Эльризе, решил по полной использовать все свои знания об игре, чтобы спасти главную героиню, Этерну, однако…

Внешность святой девы, а внутри мужик. Дерьмовой душе — дерьмовый персонаж. Как же развернётся история, где по случайности два отброса слились воедино?

altTitles.en: Fabulous Beasts
There Are Beasts

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

title.en: Kimitte Watashi no Koto Suki Nandesho?

altTitles.ja: きみって私のこと好きなんでしょ？

altTitles.zh: 你其实是喜欢我的对吧？

altTitles.en: You Like Me, Don't You?

description.en:
“Hey Kuroya-kun, do you like me?”
“How did you know!?”

Unrequited love. What a shame for Kuroya, a gloomy student in high school.
The other party is Kasumi Shiramori, a senior in the literature club and a transcendentally beautiful girl. While spending time alone in the club, I should have hidden this feeling for a long time…!
Senior told Kuroya in desperation.

“Then -? Want to try dating me first?”

There’s no way a relationship exists in the minds of these two!? No, wait, it should be like this-
Both the feelings and the super-sweet romantic comedy of youth are full of faintness in the misery of a longing senior who is teased despite being in a relationship!
  
---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (EN)](https://tentaibooks.com/en/books/you-like-me-dont-you-so-wanna-go-out-with-me-volume-1)
description.ja: 「きみって私のこと好きなんでしょ？」高校２年生の黒矢総吉は、入学当初より想いを寄せる同じ文芸部の先輩・白森霞から突然そう告げられる。ふいに本心を見抜かれた黒矢は、動揺の末に告白してしまう……するとなぜか”お試し”で付き合うことに!?年上彼女にイジられまくる恥ずかしいのに嬉しい”お試し交際
description.pt-br:
"Ei, Kuroya... você gosta de mim, não é?" 
"O quê-?! Como diabos você sabia?!" 

Kuroya é um cara comum mais ou menos do colégio. Ele estava convencido de que sua paixão estava fora de seu alcance, mas ela acabara de questioná-lo sobre seus verdadeiros sentimentos... Ele agora está prestes a morrer de vergonha! A paixão em questão é Kasumi Shiramori, e ela não apenas é mais velha e a única outra integrante do clube literário, mas também é uma das belezas renomadas da escola! 

"Como ela poderia saber que eu gostava dela?" 

Kuroya pensou consigo mesmo, totalmente lívido. Claro, passamos muito tempo juntos dentro e fora do clube, mas ainda assim! 

"Então... quer sair comigo?" 

Shiramori terminou seu combo duplo com esta proposta chocante. 

"Ela também gosta de mim?! De jeito nenhum! Alguém me belisca!"

Uma das comédias românticas mais completas que existe! Como o nosso casal navegará em seu primeiro relacionamento um com o outro?

altTitles.ja: アイドル辞めるけど結婚してくれますか!?

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

altTitles.pt-br: Estou deixando de ser uma Idol, mas você se casaria comigo!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Idol Yameru kedo Kekkon Shite Kuremasu ka!?

altTitles.vi: Anh Sẽ Kết Hôn Với Em Nếu Em Từ Bỏ Việc Trở Thành Thần Tượng Chứ?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

title.en: The War of Greedy Witches: 32 of the Wickedest Women Duel to the Death

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

altTitles.ja-ro: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau

altTitles.en: The Great Witch War: 32 Genius Witches Kill Each Other
The War of Greedy Witches

description.en:
Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches”.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0171)
**Official English Volumes:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/the-war-of-greedy-witches)
description.ja: フランスを救った奇跡の英雄ジャンヌ・ダルク。火刑に処され、その生涯を終えようとしていた彼女は死の間際、別世界へと飛ばされてしまう。そこにいたのはその名を歴史に刻み、「魔女」と呼ばれる32人の女傑たちであった。そして、最後の「魔女」ジャンヌダルクが揃い、欲深き魔女たちの殺し合い魔女千夜血戦の開幕が告げられるーー!!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.en: An Ordinary Light Music Club

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
description.es-la: Chihiro Hatono, estudiante de primer año de preparatoria y apasionada por el rock japonés se adentra en el mundo del club de música ligera con una nueva guitarra a cuestas. Pero, ¿qué le espera tras esas puertas...? ¡Un drama sobre juventud sin filtros y ambición musical toma el escenario!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

altTitles.ja: 独を白く

altTitles.zh-ro: Lian'ai Rang Wo Youle Chao Nengli

altTitles.en: Falling In Love Gives Me Superpowers

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
*“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”*

As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es:
*"Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".*

De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.
description.fr: Oscar, prince héritier du grand royaume de Farsas, se rend chez Tinasha, la sorcière la plus puissante du continent, pour lever une malédiction dont il est victime depuis sa jeunesse, qui l’empêche d’avoir des enfants. Lorsqu’il passe l’épreuve de la “Tour de la sorcière”, qui lui donne le droit à n’importe quel souhait, il demande alors la main de Tinasha !
description.ja:
呪われた王と最強の魔女が紡ぐ、【愛】と【呪い】の一大叙事詩が開幕！

このライトノベルがすごい！2020（宝島社刊）にて単行本部門とノベルズ部門でダブル１位となった伝説的ＷＥＢノベルが待望のコミック化！

永い時を生き、絶大な力で災厄を呼ぶ異端――魔女。
強国ファルサスの王太子・オスカーは、幼い頃に受けたある呪いを解くために、世界最強と名高い「青き月の魔女」のもとを訪れる。
“魔女の塔”の試練を乗り越えて契約者となったオスカーだが彼が望んだのは……。

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki no Kanojo ni Naru, Onnanoko ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 久しぶりに実家に帰ったら弟がTSしてた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisashiburi ni Jikka ni Kaettara Otouto ga TS Shiteta.

altTitles.ru: Как Младший Братик, Который Превратился в Девочку, Стал Девушкой Своего Старшего Брата

altTitles.ko: 오랜만에 친가에 돌아오니 동생이 TS되어 있었다

altTitles.ko-ro: Orenmane Chinga-e Doraoni Dongsaengi TSdoeeo Itteotda

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?
description.ru: Когда я вернулся домой в первый раз спустя долгое время, мой младший брат стал девушкой!?

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか

altTitles.en: Will You End This Love?

altTitles.ja: Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

altTitles.vi: Chấm dứt tình yêu này đi được không?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

altTitles.en: I Will Not Be Chosen

altTitles.ja: 私は選ばれない

description.en:
Although her marriage was arranged by her parents, Chloe, the daughter of a count, had deeply loved her fiancé, Ernest, the eldest heir of the Ordrand Marquis family, since childhood. However, she is struck by the shocking reality when Ernest decides to break off their engagement and choose her younger sister, Emily, instead.
Amid the pain of betrayal and heartbreak, Lionel, a young duke from the renowned Cislay family, suddenly appears and proposes marriage to her without any warning.

A short, mixed genre anthology collection of oneshots by amateur artists whose panels are bursting with drawn detail. Sold only at Comitia 2023.

altTitles.ja: 片恋ストラテジー

altTitles.en: Unrequited Love Strategy

description.en: My dear best friend likes someone else...?

title.en: Mori de Seijo wo Hirotta Saikyou no Kyuuketsu-hime Musume no Tamenara Kuni de Moassari Horoboshimasu!

altTitles.ja: 森で聖女を拾った最強の吸血姫～娘のためなら国でもあっさり滅ぼします！～@COMIC

altTitles.en: The Strongest Vampire Princess Who Found and Adopted the Baby Saint in the Forest: I'll Even Destroy a Country for My Daughter!

description.en:
Manga completed with 10 chapters and 2 bonus chapters.

The True Ancestor Angelica, feared by the world under the alias of "the Vampire Princess Who Burns Kingdoms," has once again burned an entire country with her magic today.The reason for this is... "M-Mama!" Was it for the sake of her unbearably cute daughter?!After picking up a human baby in the forest and raising her, Angelica was knocked out by her soft, pudgy skin and innocent purity, untouched by corruption.Gone was the cold-hearted killer who easily took lives, replaced by a doting mother enjoying a life of extreme affection.One day, the foolish king, aiming to kidnap her daughter, Pearl, who was actually a special "Saint," hatched a scheme. Naturally, this incited Angelica's wrath!The word "mercy" was forgotten by "Mama," who would destroy any enemy, using even the most cruel means!A cheat-level, overpowered vampire princess rampages in a dark fantasy driven by love and parental affection!
What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

altTitles.ja: 魔導剣聖ー伝説の帰還ー

altTitles.en: Legendary Return of the Magic Sword Saint

description.en: The hero who holds both the strongest title in magic, “Mage,” and the strongest title in swordsmanship, “Sword Saint,” returns to a world 1000 years after becoming a legendary figure!! Balua Westgarden, the “Magic Sword Saint” who once mastered both magic and swordsmanship and etched his name at the pinnacle of human history, challenged the absolute demon king Giranher in a decisive battle for the survival of humanity. However, due to the interference of mysterious forces, both Balua and Giranher lost their lives. For 1000 years, Balua’s soul was bound to the world by regret for dying halfway through his journey. But when Direa Westgarden, a boy who admired the Magic Sword Saint, was attacked by monsters and left on the brink of death, Balua returned to the mortal world by borrowing his body.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! Official Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい！ 公式アンソロジーコミック

altTitles.ru: Мой братик теперь не братик! Официальная комикс-антология!
